channel.title: What to do now with my fast & powerful Dedicated Server?
channel.description:
Hey Everyone
I have had a dedicated server (w2k3) for some time now;most will know that.
Today, I got a brand new one fresh off the private host.
I was wondering what peopel think i should do with it. Should i host a private server? If so, what server i should host that people would like & play?
Specs of server are: Amd2 Duel core processor 4.02ghz 8 Gig ram 1.2T Space and unmetered bandwidth on a 1gig per sec line,
Please post thoughts here as i do value what people have to say, Thanks. TiLt

item.title: What to do now with my fast & powerful Dedicated Server?
item.dc:creator: @TiLt TiLt
item.description:
@TiLt wrote:

thanks for the suggestion, feels good to talk to a real person, not a noob.

But yea, i was thinking if it, and am going to see what people say

Read full topic
item.source: What to do now with my fast & powerful Dedicated Server?

item.title: What to do now with my fast & powerful Dedicated Server?

item.description:
@barkingdogc wrote:

just hosting a server wouldnt do i would sugest an server that has alot of things mabye hippie scape would be do but you would need to change up some stuff because then it would just be like any other hippie scape server except 10x more people
